title: Velaiilla Pattadhari
summary: Velaiilla Pattadhari (transl.â€‰The Unemployed Graduate), popularly referred to as VIP, is a 2014 Indian Tamil-language action drama film written and directed by Velraj, in his directorial debut. The film features Dhanush, Amala Paul, while Vivek, Saranya Ponvannan, Samuthirakani and Surbhi play supporting roles.
